name: HipReplacementSurgeryICD9CM
title: Hip Replacement Surgery ICD9CM
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who have  total hip replacement procedures using concepts and codes from ICD9.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a total hip replacement procedure.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent the surgical procedure of a total hip replacement.  Codes used are to be ICD9CM Procedure codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)

concept.display: Revision of hip replacement, both acetabular and femoral components
Revision of hip replacement, acetabular component
Revision of hip replacement, femoral component
Revision of hip replacement, acetabular liner and/or femoral head only
Resurfacing hip, total, acetabulum and femoral head
Revision of hip replacement, not otherwise specified
